entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning except a few flurries over higher terrain. Periods of rain beginning in the afternoon. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near Bowen Island in the morning and early in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:31 PM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023
